caption:
The photograph depicts a serene, rural scene with several elements of pastoral life. A herd of cows, mostly black and white, are gathered by a river, some standing in shallow water. A herder, wearing a white garment and a hat, stands among the cattle on the riverbank, appearing to supervise or guide them.

The river bank curves gently and is flanked by dense vegetation, including bushes and various trees, hinting at a fertile environment. Beyond the river, the terrain rises slightly and is covered with sparse, semi-arid vegetation. In the distance, flat fields and low hills can be seen under a blue sky lightly dotted with clouds, indicating a spacious, open landscape typical of a rural setting.

Overall, the scene captures a moment of daily life in a pastoral environment, emphasizing the interaction between livestock and nature. The colors are natural and earthy, contributing to the tranquil and timeless quality of the image.
title: Watering cattle in the Colorado River at San Luis, Mexico
